name: Open Source HardWare Library - candidates
tagline: documents not yet in SELECTION repository
body:
#*Candidate* documents

... which have not yet been ["selected"](http://oshwl.github.io/SELECTION), so please improve them or add new ones, while trying to have the documents meet [a few criteria](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/blob/master/criteria.md).

Big **categories** of OSHW work are listed below (further detailed [here](https://raw.github.com/OSHWL/candidates/master/contents.txt)):

- *intermediate* work, also useful for work in other categories:

   - [electronics, IT hardware and monitoring](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/electro-it-monit)
   - [structures](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/structures), including work related to construction in general and assemblies in general
   - [OSHW management](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/oshw-mgmt)
   - [robotics and manufacturing](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/robo-manuf)
   - [materials](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/materials)

- rather *application-oriented* work:

   - [energy](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/energy)
   - [food](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/food)
   - [transport](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/transport)
   - [audio or visual or audiovisual](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/audio-visual)
   - [cleaning](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/cleaning)
   - [health](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/health)
   - [water](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/water)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
